framebuffer - package framebuffer
 
FrameBuffer - Class in framebuffer
A FrameBuffer represents a two-dimensional array of pixel data.
FrameBuffer(int, int) - Constructor for class framebuffer.FrameBuffer
Construct a FrameBuffer with the given dimensions.
FrameBuffer(int, int, Color) - Constructor for class framebuffer.FrameBuffer
Construct a FrameBuffer with the given dimensions.
FrameBuffer(FrameBuffer) - Constructor for class framebuffer.FrameBuffer
Create a FraameBuffer from the pixel data of another FrameBuffer.
FrameBuffer(FrameBuffer.Viewport) - Constructor for class framebuffer.FrameBuffer
Create a FrameBuffer from the pixel data of a FrameBuffer.Viewport.
FrameBuffer(String) - Constructor for class framebuffer.FrameBuffer
Construct a FrameBuffer from a PPM image file.
FrameBuffer.Viewport - Class in framebuffer
A Viewport is an inner (non-static nested) class of FrameBuffer.
